Trample
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, conjure a card named Present into your hand. [i](It's a {2} Treasure artifact with “When this artifact enters, draw a card” and “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]

Whenever this Vehicle attacks, choose one. If this Vehicle was crewed by a Santa this turn, you may choose both instead.
• [i]Naughty —[/i] This Vehicle gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
• [i]Nice —[/i] Draw a card, then discard a card.
Crew 1

Counter target spell. Conjure a card named Present into your hand. [i](It's a {2} Treasure artifact with “When this artifact enters, draw a card” and “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]

Destroy all non-Santa creatures.

cards.rules_text:
You may play festive cards you own from outside the game. As an additional cost to play lands and cast spells this way, discard a card. Mana of any type can be spent to cast a spell this way.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each color among cards in your graveyard.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Prepare to get run over by a reindeer.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Destroy target creature. Up to one target creature you control becomes Santa. [i](It's a legendary Santa and has “Creatures you control get +1/+1.”)[/i]

Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, name one of Santa's reindeer that you haven't named yet this game. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

The most heinous reindeer of all?[/i]

cards.rules_text:
This creature can't attack as long as an opponent is looking at it.
You may look at the top card of your opponents' libraries at any time.
You may cast spells from the top of opponents' libraries, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast them.

[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)[/i]

II — [i]The Nutcracker Comes to Life[/i] — Target artifact you control becomes a 4/4 artifact creature.
III — [i]The Nutcracker Slays the Seven-Headed Rat King??? [/i]— Target creature you control fights up to one other target creature.
IV — [i]The Land of Sweets — [/i]You gain 3 life.

As Michael Bublé enters, you have 30 seconds to name as many Christmas songs as you can. Michael Bublé enters with that many loyalty counters. [i](Use a timer. No looking stuff up.)[/i]
[-1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.
[-4]: Michael Bublé deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
[-X]: Target creature you control gets +X/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

cards.rules_text:
Sing-along [i](You may sing a few lines from each song ability as it triggers. If you do, copy it.)[/i]
I — [i]This is Halloween — [/i]Mill three cards.
II — [i]What's This? — [/i]You may put a land card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.
III — [i]Kidnap The Sandy Claws — [/i]Choose up to three creatures. Put a +1/+1 counter on each of them.
IV — [i]Oogie Boogie's Song — [/i]Roll two six-sided dice. Each opponent loses life equal to the difference.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever an opponent casts a festive spell or draws a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, that player loses 1 life.
At the beginning of your end step, if three or more creatures died this turn, each player draws three cards.

Choose two —
• Yule Command deals 2 damage to any target.
• Exile target artifact.
• Target player conjures two cards named Coal into their hand. [i](It's a {1} artifact with “{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
• Target player draws a card, then discards a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]star trek holiday special be like: yule log, star date 12/25[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, exile target creature an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.
As long as its snowing, players can't untap more than two lands during their untap steps.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Cold + Hopeless = Cope less
Cold + Relapse = Collapse
Cold + Morose = Comatose[/i]

cards.rules_text: Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards from the player to their left's library. [i](Remember to return them after the game.)[/i]

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact with mana value X: Choose an artifact card with mana value X that's currently legal in the Modern format and that you haven't chosen this game. Create a token that's a copy of that card.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Ben wants an signet, Sally wants a ballista...”
—Santa[/i]

cards.rules_text:
ST. N1CK Mk. 4000 has indestructible as long as you've been talking like a robot this turn.
ST. N1CK Mk. 4000 can't attack or block unless you control two or more other artifacts.
Attacking creatures you control have indestuctible and protection from Crabs as long as you've been talking like a robot this turn.
Exile target nonland permanent if it's tapped or if its controller is going off. [i](A player is going off if they've put three or more spells/abilities on the stack this turn.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]Despite his pleas to the contrary, Santa is not a sovereign citizen.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Decorate target tapped land you control [i](using whatever you have available)[/i]. As long as it remains decorated, it has “{T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors this land is decorated with.”
cards.flavor_text: [i]Even Urborg can be improved with a few lights and some tinsel.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, they choose naughty or nice —
• [i]Naughty — [/i]Conjure a card named Coal on top of that player's library. [i](It's a {1} artifact with “{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
• [i]Nice — [/i]Conjure a card named Present into your hand. [i](It's a {2} Treasure artifact with “When this artifact enters, draw a card” and “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]

Trample, vigilance
When Beefcake Santa enters, do any number of push-ups. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on up to X target creatures, where X is the number of push-ups done this way.
Whenever a creature you control attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Gifts? What you need, child, is gains.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[0]: Until your next turn, all spells have “Gift a card,” and whenever you give a gift or an opponent's spell doesn't give a gift, put two loyalty counters on Santa Claus.
[-X]: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X or less that isn't festive.
[-3]: Exchange control of two target permanents that share a permanent type.
[-10]: You get an emblem with “You may cast spells without paying their mana costs.”
cards.special_text:
[0]: Until your next turn, all spells have “Gift a card,” and whenever you give a gift or an opponent's spell doesn't give a gift, put two loyalty counters on Santa Claus.
[-X]: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X or less that isn't festive.
[-3]: Exchange control of two target permanents that share a permanent type.
[-10]: You get an emblem with “You may cast spells without paying their mana costs.”

cards.rules_text: {T}: Add {C}. If that mana is spent to cast a creature spell, throw it onto the table from at least three feet away when it resolves. If it lands on the table, it gains haste. Otherwise, sacrifice it.

As Frosty enters, stack two dice on top of it. [i](All dice must be stacked vertically, one on top of another.)[/i]
This creature gets +1/+1 for each die in its stack.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, stack a die on top of Frosty and draw a card.
When the stack falls, sacrifice Frosty.

At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card. You get a candy counter, then you lose 1 life for each candy counter you have. Then you may repeat this process any number of times. [i](You may eat candy counters any time you could cast a sorcery.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]Once a year, life really is a box of chocolates.[/i]
